content.text:
# List of honours of the British Crown awarded to heads of state and royalty

}}
This article serves as an index – as complete as possible – of all the honours (orders, decorations and medals) given by the British Crown to members of the British royal family and foreign royal families.
Awards
Monarchies
British royal family

Counsellor of State
* Andrew Mountbatten Windsor: 19 February 1981
* The Prince of Wales: 21 June 2003
* The Duke of Sussex: 15 September 2005
* The Queen: 8 September 2022
* Princess Beatrice, Mrs Edoardo Mapelli Mozzi: 8 September 2022
* The Princess Royal: 7 December 2022
* The Duke of Edinburgh: 7 December 2022
Member of His Majesty's Most Honourable Privy Council
* The Prince of Wales: 9 June 2016
* The Queen: 9 June 2016
Personal aide-de-camp to Elizabeth II
* The Duke of Kent: 1 August 1966
* The Duke of Edinburgh: 1 August 2004
* Sir Timothy Laurence: 1 August 2004
* The Prince of Wales: 17 March 2013
Personal aide-de-camp to Charles III
* The Prince of Wales: 2023
* The Duke of Edinburgh: 2023
* The Princess Royal: 15 June 2023
Royal Family Order of George VI
* Princess Alexandra, The Honourable Lady Ogilvy: 1951
Royal Family Order of Elizabeth II
* Princess Alexandra, The Honourable Lady Ogilvy: 1952
* The Princess Royal: 1969
* The Duchess of Gloucester: 1973
* The Duchess of Edinburgh: 2004
* The Queen: 2007
* The Princess of Wales: 2017
Royal Family Order of Charles III
* The Queen: 2024
* The Duchess of Edinburgh: 2024
* The Princess Royal: 2024
* The Duchess of Gloucester: 2024
* The Princess of Wales: 2025
;European monarchies
Belgian royal family
* King Albert II
** 1966: Honorary Knight Grand Cross of the Royal Victorian Order
Danish royal family
* Queen Margrethe II
** 1979: Stranger Lady Companion of the Order of the Garter
** 1974: Recipient of the Royal Victorian Chain
Dutch royal family
* Princess Beatrix
** 1989: Stranger Lady Companion of the Order of the Garter
** 1982: Recipient of the Royal Victorian Chain
** 1982: Honorary Dame Grand Cross of the Royal Victorian Order
* King Willem-Alexander
** 2018: Stranger Knight Companion of the Order of the Garter (1012th member)
Holy See pontifical family
* Pope Leo XIV
** 2025: Honorary Knight Grand Cross of Order of the Bath
Luxembourgish royal family
* Grand Duke Henri
** 1976: Honorary Knight Grand Cross of the Royal Victorian Order
Norwegian royal family
* King Harald V
**2008: Honorary Freeman of Newcastle upon Tyne
** 2001: Stranger Knight Companion of the Order of the Garter (990th member)
** 1994: Recipient of the Royal Victorian Chain
** 1955: Honorary Knight Grand Cross of the Royal Victorian Order
Spanish royal family
* King Juan Carlos I
** 1988: Stranger Knight Companion of the Order of the Garter (970th member)
** 1986: Recipient of the Royal Victorian Chain
* King Felipe VI
** 2017: Stranger Knight Companion of the Order of the Garter (1009th member)
**1988: Honorary Knight Grand Cross of the Royal Victorian Order
Swedish royal family
* King Carl XVI Gustaf
** 1983: Stranger Knight Companion of the Order of the Garter (963rd member)
** 1975: Recipient of the Royal Victorian Chain
;Asian monarchies
Bahraini royal family
* King Hamad
** 11 November 2024: Honorary Knight Grand Cross of the Royal Victorian Order
** 15 February 1979: Honorary Knight Commander of the Order of St Michael and St George
Japanese imperial family
* Emperor Akihito
** 1998: Stranger Knight Companion of the Order of the Garter (985th member)
** 1953: Honorary Knight Grand Cross of the Royal Victorian Order
** 1953: Recipient of the Queen Elizabeth II Coronation Medal
* Emperor Naruhito
** 2024: Stranger Knight Companion of the Order of the Garter (1022nd member)
Jordanian royal family
* Queen Noor
** 16 June 1989: Honorary Dame Grand Cross of the Order of St John
* King Abdullah II
** 11 November 2024: Honorary Knight Grand Cross of the Royal Victorian Order
** 6 November 2001: Honorary Knight Grand Cross of the Order of the Bath (military division)
** 12 May 1999: Honorary Knight Grand Cross of the Order of St Michael and St George
** 26 March 1984: Honorary Knight Commander of the Royal Victorian Order
* Prince Ali Bin Al-Hussein, son of Queen Alia, half-brother of King Abdullah II
** 6 November 2001: Honorary Knight Commander of the Royal Victorian Order
* Prince Muhammad bin Talal, younger brother of King Hussein I
** 26 March 1984: Honorary Knight Grand Cross of the Royal Victorian Order
* Prince Hassan bin Talal, youngest brother of King Hussein I
** 26 March 1984: Honorary Knight Grand Cross of the Royal Victorian Order
* Princess Basma, sister of King Hussein I
** 6 November 2001: Honorary Dame Cross of the Royal Victorian Order
* Colonel Timoor al-Daghistani, Princess Basma's first husband
** 6 November 2001: Honorary Knight Grand Cross of the Royal Victorian Order
* Sayyid Walid al-Kurdi, Princess Basma's second husband
** 6 November 2001: Honorary Knight Grand Cross of the Royal Victorian Order
Malaysia royal families
Pahang royal family
* Ahmad Shah of Pahang
** 1953: Recipient of the Queen Elizabeth II Coronation Medal
Qatari royal family
* Emir Tamim
** 3 December 2024: Honorary Knight Grand Cross of the Order of the Bath
Thai royal family
* King Vajiralongkorn
** 1996: Honorary Knight Grand Cross of the Royal Victorian Order
* Princess Sirindhorn
** 1996: Honorary Dame Grand Cross of the Royal Victorian Order
* Princess Chulabhorn
** 1996: Honorary Dame Grand Cross of the Royal Victorian Order
;Oceanic monarchies
Tongan royal family
* King Tupou VI
** Honorary Knight Grand Cross of the Order of St Michael and St George
** Honorary Knight Grand Cross of the Royal Victorian Order
** Honorary Knight of Justice of the Order of Saint John
** Honorary Knight Commander of the Order of the British Empire
*  Major Sosi'ua Ngalumoetutulu, 4th Kalaniuvalu-Fotofili (Princess Mele Siu'ilikutapu's husband)
** Honorary Lieutenant of the Royal Victorian Order
